name: LOVEEARTH COIN
description:
LOVE EARTH Coin, is a charity token, aiming to build a new charity model in the age of Web 3.0
The LOVE EARTH project continuous provide funding to various kinds of charity project. DAO, a Decentrized Autonomous Organization, proposes and vote for which charity project to be donated in each month
Amount of donation each month will be according to the number of valid coin addresses, based on the principle of donating 0.1 LEC per holder address per month. The more holders,the more will be donated
